properties.name: replacer.cors.allowed.origins
properties.description: Allowed origins for CORS e.g. for development

properties.name: replacer.dump.path.base
properties.description: Base path to find the dumps by project and date

properties.name: replacer.dump.batch.delay
properties.description: Delay (in milliseconds) between executions of the dump batch

properties.name: replacer.dump.batch.delay.initial
properties.description: Delay (in milliseconds) until the first execution of the dump batch

properties.name: replacer.dump.batch.chunk.size
properties.description: Number of items to be processed in batch when indexing a dump

properties.name: replacer.parse.file.delay
properties.description: Delay (in milliseconds) between executions of the external properties reloading

properties.name: replacer.wikipedia.api.key
properties.description: Key token to authenticate against MediaWiki with OAuth

properties.name: replacer.wikipedia.api.secret
properties.description: Secret token to authenticate against MediaWiki with OAuth

properties.name: replacer.page.stats.delay
properties.description: Delay (in milliseconds) between executions of the replacement count in database

properties.name: replacer.show.immutable.warning
properties.description: To include in the logs the warnings for invalid or too long immutables found

properties.name: replacer.admin.user
properties.description: User allowed to perform administrative actions like manual indexing

properties.name: replacer.processable.namespaces
properties.description: Comma-separate lists of the namespaces to be processed
